virtual bool jma::JMA_CType::isSpace ( const char *  p  )  const [pure virtual]

Check whether is white-space character.

White-space characters are " \t\n\v\f\r", and also space character in specific encoding.

Parameters:
p pointer to the character string
Returns:
true for white-space character, false for non white-space character.

Implemented in jma::JMA_CType_EUCJP, jma::JMA_CType_SJIS, and jma::JMA_CType_UTF8.

Referenced by jma::JMA_Knowledge::isStopWord().
